smg.text: Mainly cloudy. Force 2 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Haze during the day. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Light winds, becoming force 3 easterly winds.
